description: When you wash that concealer off... you're still riddled with acne!No matter how much cover-up you use, it does not get rid of the problem.- All you've done is trick yourself into thinking no-one will notice- What they do see is humps and bumps caked over with cruddy makeup- You wash you face in front of the mirror and bright red ugly zits stare right back at youWhy suffer? There's a simple and effective answer.Our face cleanser is a specially balanced, deep cleansing formula featuring Salicylic Acid penetrates into pores to dramatically decrease sebum production and fight acne causing bacteria. It soothes acne associated irritation, inflammation and redness with more than 15 nourishing botanical extracts and essential oils.Provides mild exfoliation of dead skin cells from within the follicle, keeping the pores clear of cellular debris thus reducing the number of breakouts.- Uses groundbreaking acne clearing ingredients that penetrate deep within the pores- Reduces 99% of acne-causing bacteria dead; preventing breakouts before they start- Clears away cellular debris and keeps the pores clear- Moisturizes and improves complexion to help retain a healthy glow, leaving skin smooth and softDon't just wash your face, sanitize it using this clinically proven product.Specifically formulated for acne sufferers to totally cleanse the facial area, and give you healing to be happy with.Hollywood Starshave paid dermatologists a fortune to obtain the benefits that our range of acne treatment products give. You don't have to pay that amount...You too can have clear, blemish free natural skin!Full 90-Day Money-Back Guarantee. So nothing to lose and a naturally clear complexion to gain!You deserve that Hollywood Star complexion too, don't you?Hit thatAdd to Cartbutton now
title: Acne Face Wash - Acne Cleanser moisturizing, mild and effective
